change_summary.what_changed: Download option for Windsurf Editor changed from Linux to Windows with additional options for x64 and arm64 architectures
specific_changes: Download option changed from Linux to Windows
Added options for x64 and arm64 architectures

market_signals: Windsurf is continuing to develop and improve its product
strategic_analysis.business_impact: The change may slightly improve user experience for Windows users, but it is unlikely to have a significant impact on the business
strategic_analysis.strategic_direction: Windsurf is focused on improving its product and user experience
strategic_analysis.competitive_implications: The change is unlikely to affect Windsurf's competitive position in the market
